XIII

CICERO TO TIRO

Cumae, April 10, 54 or 53 B.c.

I shall consider that you have done me every possible favour, if Ι see you in good health, I await with the greatest anxiety the arrival of Menander? whom I sent to you. As you love me, take care of your health, and mind you join us

when you have made a complete recovery. Good- bye. April lOth.
